short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share your plain text availability in 3 clicks without ever leaving your Gmail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Main features
📆 Connect all of your calendars in a single place
👥 See when your colleagues are available
🕔 Select multiple time zones
🌎 Translate your availability into different languages
❎ Create holds in your calendar
✏️ Formatting configurator to adjust the text snippet to your taste

What features are you currently missing? What do you like? We would love to hear your feedback! Just sent us an email at founders@agreeto.app 📥
